tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  species_id INT,
  species_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateMeasurements (
   measurement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   measurement_date TIMESTAMP,
   location_name VARCHAR(255),
   temperature DECIMAL,
   humidity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE BiodiversityRecords (
   record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   species_name VARCHAR(255),
   habitat_type VARCHAR(255),
   observation_date DATE,
   researcher_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE research_sites (
  location_id INT,
  site_name VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ClimateMeasurements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE BiodiversityRecords (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  population INT,
  habitat VARCHAR(255),
  date_observed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchScientists (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(255),
  institution VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  lead_scientist_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE DataSources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  url VARCHAR(255)
)
